title: Parks_n_Req
description: This app provides dynamically generated information about Texas NPS parks and campgrounds and allows the user to make a reservation at their selected site.

title: WatchIt
description: WatchIt is an app that filters a search for movies & TV shows by what streaming services the user subscribes to and provides direct streaming links to those services.

title: Work Day Scheduler
description: This app uses moment.js to color code the time blocks according to the current hour. The user is able to save events by clicking the lock button.

title: Burger Time
description: Using MySQL, node.js, Express, and Handlebars; this app populates a database filled with burgers that the user can dynamically interact with.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: This app allows the user to search any city then populates current and future weather information based on data gathered from the OpenWeatherMap API.

title: Management Template
description: Using Node.js, this app allows the user to input and change employee information, departments, and roles. Once the questions are answered, a template displaying this information is generated.
